name: Lovappy
0:
”Alexa, launch lovappy voices”
”Alexa, begin lovappy voices”
”Alexa, ask lovappy voices to find me women”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lovappy voices
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MAKE LOVE HAPPY and find love with Lovappy. Lovappy is the first hands-free dating app and the most powerful dating app ever launched - it is voice-driven. Lovappy is an entertaining dating app bringing you singles' profiles and more, like new music, dating and hiking events, as well as audiobook reviews, comedy, and Lovappy news. You will get a free experience of the power of Lovappy using this skill on Alexa. Be sure to tell Alexa to "Enable Lovappy" so that you can ask Lovappy to play a selection of potential matches according to your preferences.

For instance, after enabing Alexa, say "Alexa, launch Lovappy. Find me [gender(s)] that are [taller/shorter/same height] as [height], that speak [language(s)], that like/prefer [dogs/cats/both/no pets], that [drinks/smokes/smokes weed/no vices (habits), that is [conservative/independent/liberal], that prefers to live in the [rural/suburban/urban] areas, that prefers the [outdoors/indoors] that is a [saver/spender], that is an [extrovert/introvert], that is a [morning person/night owl], that is or is not [employed/risk taker/religious], that does or does not [have children/want children/attract many people].

You can also create a profile through Alexa, but we recommend downloading the Lovappy app to complete your profile more thoroughly (available in Google Play Store or IOS App Store).
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
